item.title: Goldman Sachs, Wells Fargo lift price targets for Apple heading into iPhone makerâ€™s earnings
item.description: Goldman Sachs and Wells Fargo both expect Apple to deliver a fiscal fourth-quarter earnings and revenue beat.

item.title: JPMorgan downgrades Goldman Sachs, favors cheaper rivals
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares of Goldman Sachs slipping 2% from their current valuation.

item.title: There's a positive technical catalyst on the horizon for India's stock market, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton goes through the charts on the INDA ETF.

item.title: From fraternities to women's soccer, this under-the-radar T-shirt brand is popping up everywhere
item.description: A loyal and growing base of consumers are driving demand for the half-century-old, Gildan-owned shirt brand Comfort Colors.

item.title: The S&P 500 has turned into an AI index. These stocks will help diversify your portfolio in case the trend has a setback
item.description: With valuations sky high for AI stocks, investors may want to start thinking of a backup plan, according to Trivariate Research founder Adam Parker.
